description: This repository contains a small fullâ€‘stack app split into two folders:

scripts.postinstall: npm ci --silent --prefix Backend && npm ci --silent --prefix Frontend
scripts.lint: npm --prefix Backend run lint && npm --prefix Frontend run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix Backend run typecheck && npm --prefix Frontend run typecheck
scripts.test:unit: npm --prefix Backend run test && npm --prefix Frontend run test
scripts.build: npm --prefix Backend run build && npm --prefix Frontend run build
